head.supplied: [August 1857] ¶ Pinus desirable for the Melbourne ¶ bot. garden...

div.p: RBG Kew, Directors' letters, vol. LXXIV, Australia letters 1851-8, letter no. 140.

[August 1857]
Although separated in the archive, the list almost certainly accompanied M to W. Hooker, 10 August 1857. See also M to W. Hooker, 15 July 1857.
